title: Human-in-the-Loop (HITL)
description: Ciri's Human-in-the-Loop system is a mandatory safety gate built into the HumanInTheLoopMiddleware at the LangGraph level. Before Ciri executes any consequential action — writing a file, running a script, calling an external service — she pauses and presents a richly formatted approval prompt. You inspect, approve, edit, or reject every proposed action.
